column5: Went flyfishing for carp for a few hours with a friend for Fathers Day. Got 5 but they r just starting to hit the shallows due to low water temps. Was fun anyways. Landry
That must of been a heck of a fight???. Nice going!
Thats cool, carp on the fly that would be intense
Nice fish Landry and you managed a few on your flygear, eh.  Well done.  Must have been a blast.
Is this a technique where I could actually use marshmellows and not feel bad about it?
Lol. Good luck casting them though. Might need a 12 weight.
